page.title: 11Chorleywood Common
page.content: Chorleywood Common lies to the East of Chorleywood town centre. Its Northern boundary is the A404 or Rickmansworth Road. The Western boundary is Common Road and its Eastern is Dog Kennel Lane in which is located Chorleywood College an important centre of education for g rls of Secondary School age who have visual deficiencies. Chorleywood Common is an important source of recreation for many local residents with a nine hole golf course and many paths for walkers. Local riding enthusiasts enjoy using the common for their hobby. The cricket pitch is still widely used and football is played on the common. To the South of the Common is the Metropolitan Railway Station.
